forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers this afternoon. High 57F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
